text: By the Lake () is a 1969 Soviet drama movie directed by Sergei Gerasimov.СМИ сообщили о госпитализации Натальи Белохвостиковой в реанимациюУ ОЗЕРА (1969) It stars Oleg Zhakov, Vasily Shukshin, and Natalya Belokhvostikova. ==Actors== * Oleg Zhakov as Barmin * Vasily Shukshin as Chernykh * Natalya Belokhvostikova as Lena Barmina * Valentina Telichkina as Valya Korolkova * Mikhail Nozhkin as Gennady Yakovlev * Natalya Arinbasarova as Katya Olzoeva * Nikolai Yeremenko Jr. as Alexey == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: By the Lake
